- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Meg, You are so sweet, I will def. have to do that. Best to you!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Meg Plummer [mailto:megplummer1@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, January 18, 2013 11:35 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners It was wonderful speaking to you. I just proposed a figure to Ed. I will review all of this over the weekend and meanwhile- Have a GREAT Vacation! By the way- it sounds like a very typical tourist thing to do, but do it anyway: go to a Luau (unless you are a vegan, than you may not enjoy it since it is much about the pig!) I went to one on the big Island at a resort and it was fantastic. It is as much about ceremony as it is about the food. Enjoy and thank you- Meg M: 919-455-8976 On Fri, Jan 18, 2013 at 8:58 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Dear Meg, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful. - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlRepUtj5vGcMPjNmDjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. - We have an index of recorded Webinars that will comprehensively cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlRepUtj5vGcMPjNmDjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. - You can review our “Independence Guide” by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlRepUtj5vGcMPjNmDjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> - I have attached the net cash estimate we created. - Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke about over the phone by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlRepUtj5vGcMPjNmDjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> (Please bookmark this page.) I will follow up with you, if you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlRepUtj5vGcMPjNmDjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Thanks!Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlRepUtj5vGcMPjNmDjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlRepUtj5vGcMPjNmDjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlRepUtj5vGcMPjNmDjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners!
